name: Jobcards Online Integration
author: Jobcards Online

sections.description: Provides integration between https://www.jobcardsonline.co.za and the woocommerce wordpress plugin. This plugin allows invoices, pro-forma invoices and clients to be created on jobcardsonline inside of wordpress. It provides full integration of the jobcardsonline system for use with woocommerce.
sections.installation:
1. Upload folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Get your API Access codes from jobcardsonline.co.za -> Settings -> API Access and enter them into the Jobcards Online Settings screen.
  4. Save and you’re ready to go.
